title: The Other Side of Life: A Discussion on Death, Dying, and the Graduation of the Soul
description: Sylvia Browne draws on her 40 years' work as a psychic and deep-trance medium. She explores the supernatural world, taking the listener on a journey of the soul. Listeners will gain tools to enhance their own psychic powers, including how to contact spirit guides and get in touch with their spiritual selves and how to make contact with a loved one who has died.
author: Sylvia Browne
